javadoc: Array of shorts that grows as needed.

methods.name: put
methods.comment:
Puts the given short value into the short array at
 the given index

methods.name: remove
methods.comment: Sets the value at the given index to 0.

methods.name: findLastNonZeroIndex
methods.comment: Finds the index of the last non-zero value.

return.comment:
The index of the last non-zero value. -1 will be returned
 if the array is empty.

methods.name: get
methods.comment: Returns the short at the given index

return.comment:
The short value at the given index. A 0 will
 be return for any index not initialized to
 another value.

methods.javadoc:
Adjusts the size of the array.
@param size The new capacity of the array.
methods.name: adjustArray
methods.comment: Adjusts the size of the array.

params.name: size
params.comment: The new capacity of the array.

name: ShortArray
comment: Array of shorts that grows as needed.
